1.name: Esports Emblem
1.description: Bold, aggressive, often featuring a mascot or shield. Great for gaming or youth brands.

2.name: Futuristic Tech
2.description: Sleek, angular lines, neon accents, and cyber-inspired forms. Ideal for AI, robotics, SaaS.

3.name: Industrial Vector
3.description: Gear elements, strong outlines, dark tones. For engineering, construction, manufacturing.

4.name: Minimal Geometric
4.description: Clean lines, simple shapes, modern symmetry. Perfect for startups and digital brands.

5.name: Modern Flat Design
5.description: No gradients, simple icons, two-tone palette. Works well for apps and digital tools.

6.name: Luxury Serif Branding
6.description: Elegant serif fonts, gold/black tones. Suitable for fashion, jewelry, upscale brands.

7.name: Cyberpunk Aesthetic
7.description: Neon lights, tech armor, high contrast. Perfect for futuristic, gaming, or AI products.

8.name: Nature Organic
8.description: Soft, curved forms, earthy colors. Ideal for wellness, environmental, health products.

9.name: Badge / Stamp Style
9.description: Circular or shield layouts with text wraps. Ideal for heritage, outdoor, food & beverage.

10.name: Mascot-Based Logo
10.description: Central illustrated character (e.g., hawk, robot, wolf). Works well for esports, schools.

11.name: Lettermark Monogram
11.description: Initial-based logo (e.g., ‘TE’ for Titan Engineering). Ideal for corporate or minimalist brands.

12.name: Wordmark Bold
12.description: Pure typographic logo with customized bold lettering. Useful for clean professional branding.

13.name: Abstract Symbolic
13.description: Unique symbol not directly tied to a real object. Great for SaaS, fintech, or AI companies.

14.name: Gradient Tech Theme
14.description: Color transitions with layered depth and light glows. For web3, crypto, and fintech.

15.name: Retro-Futuristic
15.description: 80s inspired lines, grids, and neon. Works for vintage tech or entertainment brands.

16.name: Slab Serif Industrial
16.description: Heavy serif fonts and structured layouts. For hardware, tools, engineering.

17.name: Hand-Drawn Artisan
17.description: Sketchy, personal style. Good for handmade, creative, or local business vibes.

18.name: Gothic
18.description: Dark, heavy typography, ornate patterns. For heavy industries, tattoos, or niche fashion.

19.name: Corporate Tech Stack
19.description: Clean icon next to name, often in blue/gray. Good for B2B, consulting, SaaS companies.

20.name: Dynamic Motion Style
20.description: Lines or arcs showing speed, motion, or transformation. For delivery, automotive, or sports.
